creator: scaglione@starnetone.de
text:
Sometimes browsers (especially IE) cache 30x and 50x responses, using the 
ErrorHeader directive is possible to CacheControl headers with those response 
codes attenuating the problem. It was introduced in apache 1.3.27, would be 
nice to have it in apache 2.0 too.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
The ability to use the Header directive for all responses has been added to 2.1
and may be backported to 2.0 at some point.  Thanks for your suggestion.
